item.description: Our lovely member, Toni Andrews, will be participating in a book signing at Barnes & Noble in Holyoke. This event is entitled "The Writing and Publishing Process of a Novleist". Her book "Beg for Mercy" is a paranormal thriller that will have you turning pages and wanting more. I encourage all of you to support the creativity and artistic abilities of our Toni by showing up to the signing. If you hang around long enough we can mosey on down to JP's which is just a hop skip and a jump away from Barnes & Noble for a drink.
item.name: "Beg for Mercy"
